Moscow says Russia, China agree that Russia must be present in Ukraine talksRussian Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Galuzin and China's special representative for Eurasian affairs, Li Hui, said it is impossible to discuss a Ukraine settlement without Moscow's participation, the Russian foreign ministry said on Sunday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 22:49:57 GMT DMSJEDODCFLJZJJUGZJ5D2NLB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/moscow-says-Russia-china-agree-that-Russia-must-be-present-ukraine-talks-2024-03-02/Reuters世界
Yellen sees big jump in US imports from Chile, eyes progress on green transitionU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Saturday predicted expanding demand for lithium - a core component needed in batteries for electric vehicles - would boost U.S. imports from Chile substantially in coming years. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 19:10:32 GMT MAT3BUIQ4VJC3AT74JAU7K6YEY https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/yellen-visits-us-lithium-site-chile-eyes-progress-green-transition-2024-03-02/Andrea Shalal可持续发展气候与能源
X, ByteDance, Booking.com could face tough EU rulesElon Musk's X social media platform, TikTok owner ByteDance and Booking.com may meet EU criteria subjecting them to tough tech rules as so-called gatekeepers, the European Commission said late Friday, after notifications by the companies. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 14:01:15 GMT SIDKQHIEMVPV5KDGPL5XNE3DZU https://www.reuters.com/technology/x-bytedance-bookingcom-could-face-tough-eu-rules-2024-03-02/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
India to build new naval base on Lakshadweep archipelago to boost securityIndia plans to commission a new naval base in the Lakshadweep islands, off the country's south-west coast, to boost security in the region, the Ministry of Defense said on Saturday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 13:10:55 GMT UWTITGDDDNOZVJVB262RWLWXZI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-build-new-naval-base-lakshadweep-archipelago-boost-security-2024-03-02/Reuters世界印度
Rocky start set WTO talks up for minimal resultsIt was billed as the "reform ministerial" that could lay a platform for updated global trading rules fit for modern challenges, from climate change to rising agricultural and industrial subsidies. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:58:50 GMT ZTCCZ7VWAJIO7NMYP7QAPWP32I https://www.reuters.com/world/rocky-start-set-wto-talks-up-minimal-results-2024-03-01/Emma Farge, Rachna Uppal世界
The politics and economics behind Biden's China-car espionage probePresident Joe Biden, vowing to "do right by U.S. auto workers," launched an investigation this week into whether Chinese-made vehicles could be used to spy on Americans, a far-off threat given the few such cars on U.S. roads now. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:32:34 GMT C5D73HTMH5LFZOUEKO4A52PTXY https://www.reuters.com/world/politics-economics-behind-bidens-china-car-espionage-probe-2024-03-01/David Shepardson, Jarrett Renshaw, Michael Martina世界
